description: Pass 1 CREATE operation for shell_files. Creates document container record during file upload and populates metadata from file analysis and entity detection. This is a multi-pass table: Pass 1 creates, Pass 2 may update status, Pass 3 updates synthesis fields.

patient_id.guidance: References user_profiles(id) ON DELETE CASCADE. From upload context - which patient this file belongs to.

filename.guidance: System-generated unique filename including timestamp. NOT NULL. Used for object storage identification.

original_filename.guidance: Preserve original filename for user reference. NOT NULL. Display to user in UI.

file_size_bytes.guidance: BIGINT type. Must be non-negative. Required for storage quota and cost tracking.

mime_type.guidance: Standard MIME type string. NOT NULL. Determines processing pipeline (PDF vs image).

storage_path.guidance: Full path in object storage bucket. NOT NULL. Used for file retrieval.

status.guidance: NOT NULL with default 'uploaded'. Pass 1 sets to 'processing' during entity detection, then 'completed' or 'failed'. Pass 2 may update to 'completed' after enrichment.

processing_started_at.guidance: TIMESTAMPTZ. Set when Pass 1 begins entity detection. ISO 8601 format with timezone.

processing_completed_at.guidance: TIMESTAMPTZ. Set when Pass 1 finishes (success or failure). ISO 8601 format with timezone.

processing_error.guidance: JSONB object. Only populated if status='failed'. Include error_code, error_message, retry_count, can_retry.

file_type.guidance: Pass 1 AI vision determines document type. 9 allowed values. Helps route to appropriate processing pipeline.

file_subtype.guidance: Optional refinement of file_type. Free text - no constraints. AI-determined.

confidence_score.guidance: NUMERIC(3,2) - 2 decimal places, 0.00-0.99 range. Higher = more confident classification.

extracted_text.guidance: TEXT field. Can be very large. Contains all text extracted by OCR during Pass 1. Used for entity detection.

ocr_confidence.guidance: NUMERIC(3,2) - 2 decimal places. Average confidence from OCR engine. Low values (<0.60) indicate poor quality scan.

page_count.guidance: INTEGER. Defaults to 1. Extracted from PDF or detected from multi-page image.

processing_job_id.guidance: References job_queue table (from 08_job_coordination.sql). Optional - only if using job queue system.

processing_worker_id.guidance: VARCHAR(100). Identifies which processing worker handled this file. Useful for debugging and load balancing.

processing_priority.guidance: INTEGER. Lower = higher priority. Defaults to 100. Used by job queue for processing order.

idempotency_key.guidance: Unique TEXT field. Prevents duplicate file uploads. Database has unique index on this field.

processing_cost_estimate.guidance: DECIMAL(10,4) - up to $9,999.9999 with 4 decimal places. Pass 1 populates with OCR/vision costs. Pass 2 adds enrichment costs.

processing_duration_seconds.guidance: INTEGER. Time from processing_started_at to processing_completed_at in seconds. Performance tracking.

language_detected.guidance: TEXT. ISO language code. Defaults to 'en'. AI vision can detect non-English documents.

provider_name.description: Healthcare provider name extracted from document
provider_name.guidance: TEXT. Extracted from document header/footer if visible. Optional - may not be present.

facility_name.description: Healthcare facility name extracted from document
facility_name.guidance: TEXT. Extracted from document if visible. Optional - may not be present.

upload_context.guidance: TEXT. User can provide context when uploading. Optional.

processed_image_path.description: Phase 2: Storage path for downscaled image
processed_image_path.guidance: TEXT. Phase 2 optimization: path to downscaled image used for OCR and Pass 1+. CHECK constraint: 1-2048 characters.

processed_image_checksum.description: Phase 2: SHA256 checksum of processed image
processed_image_checksum.guidance: TEXT. SHA256 hash for idempotency - prevents redundant downscaling if image already processed.

processed_image_mime.description: Phase 2: MIME type of processed image
processed_image_mime.guidance: TEXT. May differ from original mime_type (PNGâ†’PNG, JPEG optimized, TIFF/PDF pass-through).

ai_synthesized_summary.guidance: TEXT. Pass 1 leaves this NULL. Pass 3 populates with AI-generated summary of all narratives.

narrative_count.guidance: INTEGER. Pass 1 defaults to 0. Pass 3 updates with number of clinical narratives created.

synthesis_completed_at.guidance: TIMESTAMPTZ. Pass 1 leaves this NULL. Pass 3 sets when synthesis completes.

extraction_guidelines.pass1_operation: CREATE new shell_files record during file upload
extraction_guidelines.required_fields_strict: All 6 required fields (patient_id, filename, original_filename, file_size_bytes, mime_type, storage_path) must be provided
extraction_guidelines.status_default: status defaults to 'uploaded' but is NOT NULL - always provide value
extraction_guidelines.pass3_fields_null: ai_synthesized_summary, narrative_count, synthesis_completed_at must remain NULL/0 - Pass 3 will update
extraction_guidelines.timestamps: Set processing_started_at when beginning Pass 1, processing_completed_at when finishing
extraction_guidelines.error_handling: If processing fails, set status='failed' and populate processing_error JSONB
extraction_guidelines.file_classification: file_type and confidence_score determined by AI vision analysis
extraction_guidelines.ocr_extraction: extracted_text and ocr_confidence populated from OCR engine results
extraction_guidelines.metadata_extraction: provider_name and facility_name extracted if visible in document

validation_rules.status: Must be one of 5 enum values (NOT NULL, defaults to 'uploaded')
validation_rules.file_type: If provided, must be one of 9 enum values
validation_rules.confidence_score: If provided, must be 0.00-0.99 with 2 decimal places
validation_rules.ocr_confidence: If provided, must be 0.00-0.99 with 2 decimal places
validation_rules.page_count: If provided, must be positive integer
validation_rules.processing_cost_estimate: If provided, must be non-negative with max 4 decimal places
